synopsis.text: Based on the information provided, this anime tells the story of middle school students struggling to find their path forward. As they leave behind the comforts of childhood and elementary school friendships, the road ahead seems daunting and uncertain. The song "Tomo: Tabidachi no Toki" aims to provide encouragement during this transitional life stage. It acknowledges the difficulty of moving towards an unclear future and letting go of the past. However, with perseverance and courage, the students can step forwards into the next phase of their lives. This anime and its featured song capture both the bittersweet nature of growing up, and the hope present in new beginnings. Its themes of personal growth and overcoming adversity may resonate with viewers entering their own seasons of change. Ultimately, it suggests that with the support of friends and mentors, students can find the strength within themselves to create their own futures.
